NOTES: New developments prohibited; improvements to existing structures are permitted with public hearing. Buildings must be proven to not increase flooding by more than 1 foot in the community, and structures to be substantially improved must be elevated to 1 foot above base flood elevation; full list of development standards found in Section VII of Flood Hazard Bylaws.
PUD permitted uses are the uses permitted in the proposed districts
PUD permitted uses are the uses permitted in the proposed districts

NOTES: Any changes to existing structures must be approved by the planning commission, including additions, alterations, demolition, and relocation of the structure.
